rules_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If you control a creature with toughness 4 or greater, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]As Ozhka's legion bore down on Vhalor, Ing'Wei's past and future intertwined. In that moment, she felt confidence, fear, and somehow, peace; all her enemies saw was deep blue.[/i]
